originalText.text: I had worse experience with Dr Robert Ashinsk, I asked him to help me to put attachments on my teeth for a invisaline treatment, with he agreed to help me, he was not my invisaline dentist, but i asked him for the help, he never gave me price for the service, even though i asked him 3 times that i was at his office. Simple task that shouldn’t cost more than 3 visits. He neve gave me estimate for the services, and decided to charge me a lot money, without my previous agreement. He was very dishonest with me. For that I don’t recommend him to anyone. The first service provider I know that do services without contract, or previous explanation for the billing in advance. I only wanted to remind that I trusted him at first because he help me in past,he took advantage of that, and decided to charge me whatever without my agreement!

originalText.text: My experience with Dr. Ashinsky is always the best. He’s been taking care of my teeth for over 5 years. Very professional and the quality of service is a 10+. He takes very good care of my teeth and always recommend what is best to keep my teeth healthy.  His hygienist is the best too. I would definitely recommend him to my friends if they should ever need an “excellent “, caring dentist.

originalText.text:
I have been a patient of Dr. Ashinsky for 8 years and I was always more than satisfied. From the small things to the larger issues he helped me with, him and his team are extremely competent and professional, as well as caring and fun! I’m very sensitive and had various issues and pains over the years. The Dr. always explains very simply what is going on and the options we have, while making me feel comfortable during the procedures.
I have the biggest respect for Dr. Ashinsky and his practice and feel very lucky to have found him.

originalText.text: I have been a patient of Dr. Ashinsky's for approximately 6 years. In my estimation he is highly skilled, friendly and has always been there for me when I've a dental emergency. He is a mensch and I highly recommend him to anyone in need of a dentist.

text.text: I have been a patient of Dr. Ashinsky's for approximately 6 years. In my estimation he is highly skilled, friendly and has always been there for me when I've a dental emergency. He is a mensch and I highly recommend him to anyone in need of a dentist.

originalText.text: Dr. Ashinsky and his team were fabulous. I typically dread going to the dentist but they made the experience worthwhile: they were patient, knowledgeable and communicated in a way that made me feel heard, confident and safe. Also he was very kind and understanding as I had to bring my young son with me. In a time like this I really appreciated that. I totally recommend him
